title: Recently Renovated 2 Bed 2 Bath Centennial Condo!
posting_body: This 2 bedroom 2 full bathroom condo one block away from the South Glenn mall area is available for rent September 1st.
It's a ground level condo sharing only one wall which is ideal if you want to come home to a quiet place.
The whole condo was renovated last year with a brand new kitchen with stainless steel appliances, washer and dryer, hardwood floors, and 1,300 square feet of living space!
There's also a fenced in outdoor area in the back for pets, BBQ, etc.
This complex also offers an indoor pool, hot tub, gym, and and communal party area.
You're also 300 yards from all the attractions of the South Glenn mall: all kinds of restaurants, bars, Whole Foods, a movie theatre, and shopping all within less than 5 minutes walking.
The place is also 10 minutes from DTC for professionals who want a short commute and 25 minutes to downtown Denver.

Several parks nearby for those warm weather days such as Cherry Knolls park, DeKoevend park which leads into the Highland Canal trail which happens to be one of those most gorgeous bike rides/city hiking trails in all the metro area.
If interested please respond to this ad and I will get in touch with you!
